item.title: Focus Mode (aka Distraction Free Mode) in Komodo
item.description: I really like working with Komodo when it's at its absolute simplest UI configuration. I generally turn off everything except the editor, then use Commando to navigate my way around.

item.title: EditorConfig Your Komodo
item.description: Ever heard of EditorConfig? We sure have. Numerous requests have come in for us to add support, on our bug tracker, our forums and even in person (we still have the stickers).

item.title: Quickly Run Shell Commands with Komodo IDE
item.description: With Komodo 9.1 we've added a new shell scope, which facilitates our new package managers integration. But you can also use it simply to run shell commands.

item.title: Using Custom Workspaces with Komodo 9.1
item.description: !Komodo Custom Workspaces Recently we released Komodo 9.1 and with it we added some powerful new features such as Commando Package Manager and Shell scope. I worked on a tool to help our users more quickly get back to work.

item.title: Package Management at Your Fingertips in Komodo 9.1
item.description: One of our big features in 9.1 is package management; you can easily install your project dependencies just by invoking Commando and installing the package you are in need of.

item.title: Package Managers, Shell Commands & Workspaces - Introducing Komodo 9.1
item.description: We've been busy - very busy. Roughly 2 months after Komodo 9.0 and a month after 9.0.1, we're introducing Komodo 9.1. To say we're committed is an understatement. You can download the latest Komodo 9.1 release from our Download section.

item.title: Komodo 9.1 Pre-Release Now Available
item.description: We're very happy to announce the pre-release of Komodo 9.1. This release primarily focuses on Commando, and its all-new package management functionality.

item.title: Go For Pythonistas
item.description: As you may know, we've recently added Golang support in Komodo IDE 9.

item.title: Komodo IDE for Teams + Bonus Coffee Offer
item.description: When you're working on a project on your own, the power of Komodo IDE is obvious in the features: code intelligence, debugging, version control, great workflow and file management, and extensibility.

item.title: Komodo - Your New Markdown Editor
item.description: We've already talked about Commando and Track Changes; today I'm giving you a quick demo of the new Markdown Viewer in Komodo.

item.title: Komodo Sale Ends Tomorrow
item.description: This is just a gentle reminder that **Komodo IDE is on sale** at amazing prices, but only until midnight tomorrow (April 30th).

item.title: Random Hacks of Kindness - True Community Love
item.description: ActiveState recently sponsored a lunch for the entire group that participated in the Vancouver Chapter's Random Hacks of Kindness - a movement that is very close to my heart.

item.title: Komodo IDE: 80's Tunes to Code By
item.description: It's Friday, so please allow me some indulgence. A child of the eighties (Err... Well, maybe nineties... A lady never tells!) I've been going through my playlists today, "rocking out" to some of the great 80's classics.

item.title: Changing Color Schemes in Komodo (You Know You Wanna)
item.description: If you're going to be staring at a screen all day writing code, you had better enjoy looking at your screen! Many IDEs and Editors allow you ability to make your editor have a custom look, and Komodo is no exception.

item.title: Komodo 9.0.1 Released, Many Fixes & Enhancements
item.description: Less than a month after our awesome 9.0 release, we're following up with our first minor Komodo 9 release. This build contains important bug fixes and is a recommended update for all Komodo 9 users.
